# ZenComm
Sync/Async binary socket protocol, works with Unix and TCP/IP

### Examples

```bash
./tests
 ├── async_client.py # async client example
 ├── async_server.py # async server example
 ├── client.py       # sync client example
 └── server.py       # sunc server example
```
